scripts.test:dev: cross-env TARGET_ENV=dev CLEAR_LOGS=1 node scripts/clear-logs.js && npx dotenv -e .env.dev -- playwright test --workers=1
scripts.test:prod: cross-env TARGET_ENV=prod CLEAR_LOGS=1 node scripts/clear-logs.js && npx dotenv -e .env.prod -- playwright test --workers=1
scripts.test:all: npm run test:dev && npm run test:prod
